sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根据现代急救理念，电除颤必须与心肺复苏联合应用。

sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际理论与应用化学联合会的网站。

sentences.english: At no time, though, did Reagan ever criticize the United Nations specifically.
sentences.chinese: 但里根从未对联合国提出过明确的批评。

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛开始赞助的非洲足球联合会非洲年度最佳球员。

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得联合广场怎么样？

sentences.english: There will be a demilitarized , federated United States of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 将非军事化，联合美国，欧洲。

sentences.english: S. joint communiques and the fundamental norms governing international relations.
sentences.chinese: 它违背《中美三个联合公报》和基本的国际关系准则。

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 里皮回想去在联合会杯上他的队伍输给埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of paroxetine with buspirone in the treatment of depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨丁螺环酮与帕罗西汀联合治疗抑郁症的效果。

sentences.english: The two countries combined together against their enemy.
sentences.chinese: 这两个国家联合起来一致对敌。

sentences.english: Regional and sub-regional organizations could play unique roles under the leadership of the United Nations. Financial support is important.
sentences.chinese: 区域和次区域组织可以在联合国领导下发挥独特作用。

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 这是我担任联合国秘书长两年多来的第三次访问。

sentences.english: This complex emits low pollution levels and employs many workers.
sentences.chinese: 联合企业释放低污染并且雇用很多工人。

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮质激素联合CTX治疗狼疮样肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: The national team of the United Arab Emirates made the lizard.
sentences.chinese: 来自阿拉伯联合酋长国的队伍制作了这个蜥蜴。

sentences.english: These bonds would also be jointly and severally guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 这类欧元债券还将获得多个国家的联合担保。
